name: Pingo's Revenge
description:
Free your girlfriend from the clutches of the evil Zonk
When you wake up one fine morning, you realize that your girlfriend is no longer there: she has disappeared!

You immediately go in search of her. To do so, you have to make your way through dangerous ice areas. But be warned: Your enemies want to stop you from freeing your girlfriend!

Are you brave enough to face your enemies and rescue your girlfriend?





Master the different levels by acting cleverly
In order for you to defeat your opponents, you have two options: By strategically moving or destroying ice blocks, you can push the three diamonds together in such a way that you complete the level immediately.

If you were too clumsy to push all the diamonds together, you have only one last chance: eliminate all the opponents and get to the next level!






Since your journey is long and dangerous, the level map will let you know how far you are from the love of your life. The more levels you clear, the closer you get to your beloved.
If you manage to earn extra lives at the red buoys, this increases the chance of saving your beloved.
